entry.name: addClass
entry.title: .addClass()

argument.name: className
argument.desc: One or more space-separated classes to be added.

argument.name: function
argument.desc: A function returning one or more space-separated class names.

entry.desc: Adds the specified class(es) to each element in the set of matched elements.

longdesc.p: This method does not replace a class. It simply adds the class.
The .addClass() method changes the className property on the selected elements.

example.desc: Add the class "selected" to the matched elements.
